delete_post_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
X_posts: {count, plural, =0 {No posts} one {# post} other {# posts}}
delete_reply_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
server_of_group_no_wall: This group's server doesn't support wall posts.
X_people_voted: {count, plural, one {# person} other {# people}} voted.
err_poll_already_voted: You've already voted in this poll.
err_poll_expired: Voting in this poll has already ended.
poll_option_votes_empty: No one voted for this option.
X_people_voted_title: {count, plural, one {# person} other {# people}} voted
wall_empty: No one has written anything here… Yet.
total_X_posts: {count, plural, one {# post} other {# posts}} total
edit_poll_warning: If you change anything in the poll, all votes will be reset.
graffiti_clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to erase this graffiti?
graffiti_close_confirm: Are you sure you want to quit drawing without saving?
post_visible_to_followers: This post is only visible to {name}''s followers
post_visible_to_followers_mentioned: This post is only visible to {name}''s followers and mentioned people
post_visible_to_friends: This post is only visible to {name}''s friends
commenting_on_repost_hint: Your comment will appear on {name}''s original post.
embed_post_explanation: Embed this post on your website by copying this code:
post_action_updated_avatar: updated {gender, select, male {his} female {her} other {their}} profile picture:
post_suspended_warning_show: Post by a suspended user. Show.
post_suspended_warning: Post by a suspended user. Log in to view.
comment_suspended_warning_show: Comment by a suspended user. Show.
comment_suspended_warning: Comment by a suspended user. Log in to view.
